actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to decrease the amounts of outside earned income which a Member may accept, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends rule XLVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to: (1) decrease the amount of outside earned income a Member may earn from 30 percent to 15 percent of such Member's aggregate salary; and (2) prohibit a Member from accepting an honorarium of more than $1,000 in value.

titles.title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to decrease the amounts of outside earned income which a Member may accept, and for other purposes.
